attributes.action: Encourage all member states of the European Union to remove VAT from memorials to dead children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the present time, funerals for children are zero rated for VAT, but the tax is applied to the purchase of any memorial to a dead child. The death of a child is the worst thing that any parent will have to face, but to then have to pay a tax which suggests that there is a value attached to the death of the child is hurtful and insulting, and should be removed. Please sign this petition and forward the link to all contacts who live within the EEC.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to encourage all member states of the European Union to remove VAT from memorials to dead children.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=DeadChildTax
